Prepare config from raw file

Source: R/Config.R
config_prep_raw.Rd

Prepares config from raw file.

Usage

config_prep_raw(path, name, descr, pat, type = "tsv", v = "latest", ...)

Arguments

path

(character(1))
File path.

name

(character(1))
File nickname.

descr

(character(1))
File description.

pat

(character(1))
File pattern.

type

(character(1))
File type.

v

(character(1))
File version.

...

Passed on to readr::read_delim.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
path <- here::here("nogit/oa_v2/esvee/prep/COLO829_tumor.esvee.prep.fragment_length.tsv")
name <- "prepfraglen"
descr <- "Fragment length stats."
pat <- "\\.esvee\\.prep\\.fragment_length\\.tsv$"
type <- "tsv"
v <- "latest"
l <- config_prep_raw(path = path, name = name, descr = descr, pat = pat, type = type, v = v)
} # }
